info.name: Healix
info.description:
# Healix API Documentation

Welcome to the **Healix API**.  
This API powers the Healix healthcare platform, providing endpoints for authentication, file uploads, user management, and healthcare services.

## Base URL

{{url}}

## Authentication

Most endpoints require **Bearer Token authentication**.

item.name: Image upload
item.description: Uploads an image file (e.g. report, prescription, or profile).

response.name: FAQ
First Aid
Get Dashboard Statistics
patient_register

request.description: Generated from cURL: curl --location '{{url}}/api/users/me' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --request PUT --data '{"full_name":"John Doe","phone":"+1234567890","address":"123 Main St"}'
